description.value: You have a strong connection to beasts, and you are allied with a beast companion. You are trained in Athletics. You also gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.f2Pl5dWEL9ZvEyI1]{Animal Companion (Druid)} druid feat. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Zmh4ynfnCtwKeAYl]{Heal Animal} order spell. Committing wanton cruelty to animals or killing animals unnecessarily is anathema to your order. (This doesnâ€™t prevent you from defending yourself against animals or killing them cleanly for food.)
